title: Naan Wrap With Planted Chicken Skewers Tikka
instructions: Marinate the planted.chicken skewers in tikka paste mixed with plant-based yogurt for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat a grill pan over medium-high heat. Cook the marinated skewers for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally until charred and cooked through.
Warm the naan bread in a dry pan or on the grill for about 1 minute per side.
Prepare fresh salad with sliced cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and lettuce.
Spread a generous layer of mint-coriander chutney or raita on the warm naan.
Place the grilled tikka skewers and fresh salad on the naan, then roll it up tightly into a wrap.
Serve immediately with extra chutney on the side.
